mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RecentRecom (RecentRecomID, ProductID, AddedDate) VALUES (RecentRecom_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productID}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT RecentRecomID, ProductID, AddedDate FROM ( SELECT RecentRecomID, ProductID, AddedDate, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM RecentRecom ORDER BY AddedDate DESC ) WHERE rnum <= 5
